title: Characters of diagonal products and Hilbert-Schmidt stability
authors: Alon Dogon, Arie Levit, Itamar Vigdorovich
abstract:
We study the character theory of diagonal products as well as alternating and
elementary enrichments of groups. Our motivation is to show Hilbert-Schmidt
stability for various diagonal products, including the classical family of B.
H. Neumann groups. Additionally, we initiate a quantitative study of
Hilbert-Schmidt stability for infinitely presented groups, through the notion
of stability radius growth, and exhibit an uncountable family of
Hilbert-Schmidt stable amenable groups with arbitrarily large such growth. Some
applications to local Hilbert-Schmidt stability are also provided.
